resources.string: Enter a new password for the Manager login
Assign yourself a Manager login to access all features of the application on this device.
The Merchant ID and/or Activation Code are incorrect. Please try again.
Assign yourself a Manager login to access all features of the application on this device.

You have selected the Admin user. Resetting the Admin password requires you to enter all of your Merchant Credentials again. Only if they match their previous settings will you be allowed to set a new password.\n\nDo you want to reset the Admin password\?
\nPassword must contain at least one number and at least one letter and no special characters.\nNew password cannot match last 4 passwords.
This card type does not support swiped card verify transactions. Please enter the card information manually.
Answer must be %1$d to %2$d characters long.

The files were save to: 

 %s

Email now?
You do not have access to audit log controls. Please contact your admin.
Audit logs are not available in demo mode. In standard mode they store and retain up to %d months of information for events such as transactions, logins, etc.
Files could not be exported. Please try again.

This transaction is partially approved for $%1$s. The balance due is $%2$s.

There is also an AVS Mismatch.

Do you want to Accept or Void this transaction?
This transaction has an AVS Mismatch.\n\nDo you want to Accept or Void this transaction?

Please call the Heartland Service Center at
1-888-963-3600 to change any of these settings.
Please call the Heartland Service Center at 888-963-3600 if you have any questions.
Access to the device\'s storage is required to send the photo with the transaction. If you\'d like to allow this, select Allow in the next dialog.
You can not delete current user.
You can not edit the Manager user.
The card is not valid for the transaction type.
Please ask the Manager (owner) to log into this device and reset your password for you.
Storage unavailable. Please check your device settings and try again
The reader requires configuration (missing or incorrect PDL). Please contact the Heartland Service Center at 1-888-963-3600.
Heartland Batch Summary Report for Current Batch %s
Heartland Tip Report for Current Batch %s
Allows the application to access Heartland Payment Systems applications.
Same card number, transaction type, and amount as previous transaction. Allow duplicate transaction?
The email could not be sent. Would you like to try again?
Enter recipient email address. Use semicolon delimited list for multiple email addresses.
Enter customer email address. Use semicolon delimited list for multiple email addresses.
The file could not be created. Please check your storage and try again.
Storage is unavailable. Please reconnect it and try again.
Gateway Declined the Batch Close Request
Unable to connect to the gateway, please check your internet connection and try again. If problem persists please call support at (888-963-3600).
How can we help your business?
Login Timeout must be between 5 and 20 minutes.
The internet appears to be offline.
Verify your gateway settings are correct.
New password must be between 1 and 20 characters.
The device\'s location can be sent with each transaction in order to help fight fraud. If you\'d like to allow this, select Allow in the next dialog.
Login Name must be %1$d to %2$d characters long.
Card number entered manually, change transaction type or swipe card to proceed.
Maximum Transaction Amount must be between $1 and $99,999.
The reader\'s configuration has changed. Please restart it now.
No printer found, unable to print receipt
Production credentials cannot be used with a dev build.
There is not enough space on the device to enable audit logging. To enable it please free up space on internal or external storage and restart this application.
Please call the Heartland Support Center at 1-888-963-3600 to register to use this application, or to reset your Activation Code.
Are you sure you want to log out\?
You may enter an optional customer code.
You may enter an optional tax amount.
This transaction is partially approved for $%1$s. The balance due is $%2$s.\n\nDo you want to Accept or Void this transaction?
Your password has expired and must be changed.
Password must be %1$d to %2$d characters long.
A printer must be selected when using a P25 Reader.
Invalid iCMP RBA configuration. Please call the Heartland Service Center at 1-888-963-3600."
An error occurred . Please try again.
A reader must be selected when using an iCMP Reader.
Connection with the reader failed. Please try again.
Connect the iCMP reader to a power source. The iCMP reader must remain powered until the procedure is complete.
The device\'s microphone is used to communicate with the selected card reader. If you\'d like to allow this, select Allow in the next dialog.
Attached is a copy of the report.
The Max SAF Transaction Amount must be between \$1 and \$2,500.
%s\n\nDo you want to accept this transaction for later processing? Please refer to Help for more information.
The Max Outstanding SAF Total must be between \$1 and \$5,000.
Maximum Tax Rate must be between 0% and 99.99%.
No SD card installed, unable to send email.
No SD card installed, unable to print receipt.
Select a security question and provide an answer
Enter email address. Use semicolon delimited list for multiple email addresses.
Send log files to Heartland Service Center
The settings could not be downloaded. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to settle the batch?
The open batch contains transactions that are over 20 hours old. The settle batch function needs to be run for settlement to occur.\n\nSettle Batch Now?
I agree to pay this amount according to the cardholder agreement.
There was an error processing your signature. Please try again.
I accept this refund amount according to the cardholder agreement.
Are you sure you want to submit pending transactions?
An error occurred while upgrading this application. Please contact the Heartland Support Center at 1-888-963-3600
Upgrading the system. Please do not close the app…
You are taking a Test Drive. Live credit card transactions will NOT be processed. Any data entered will NOT be saved.
Transaction Response Timeout must be between 15 and 60 seconds.
%s\n\nDo you want to try again? If you answer No the transaction will be completed without sending the CPC information.
Unable to send commercial card information
This transaction has already been settled and cannot be voided. Please resync the current open batch with Portico.
There are unadjusted tip transaction(s) present.\n\nWould you like to adjust them before settlement?
An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
An unknown server error occurred. Please try again.
Invalid iCMP security configuration. Please call the Heartland Service Center at 1-888-963-3600.
Invalid iCMP reader configuration. Select YES to update (approx. 10 min) the reader now. \nOr, call the Heartland Service Center at 1-888-963-3600."
This user has unadjusted tip transactions.
The entered Merchant Credentials do not match those already saved.
Prompt to Send Receipt to Customer
Are you sure you want to void this transaction?
Audit logs from this device can be stored in order to help fight fraud. If you\'d like to allow this, select Allow in the next dialog.
